segments.text: I have some photos here taken by myself . Would you like to see them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Speaking of photos , what type of film will be the best ? You know , I'm planning a tour to Jiuzhaigou Valley .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would get Fuji 200 film for taking photos of natural beauty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you so much . You're an expert .
segments.speaker: S2
